flawed_nl_solution:
Eustace's current age must be 39 years old - 3 years = <<39-3=36>>36 years old.
So Milford's current age must be 36 years old / 2 = <<36/2=18>>18 years old.
So in 3 years, Milford will be 18 years old + 3 years = <<18+3=12>>12 years old.
#### 12

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21, not 12. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
